title: Tethys Ocean
summary: The Tethys Ocean /ˈtiːθəs, ˈtɛθəs/ (Greek: Τηθύς Tēthús), also called the Tethys Sea or the Neo-Tethys, was an ocean during much of the Mesozoic Era located between the ancient continents of Gondwana and Laurasia, before the opening of the Indian and Atlantic oceans during the Cretaceous Period.
